thanks for your PR, the change looks good.

我更建议加一个class的检测机制，发现是kotlin的类，额外处理，
fastjson里是这么干的。
spring mvc里有不少地方也是这么干的。
good idea
you can use dubbo-starter maintained by @mercyblitz
It seems the second try-block can be removed。
you can submit a PR？

Unnecessary Formatting codes.

fixed

@kimmking Thanks for your reply, We are planing to open source extension for dubbo and wish dubbo can split the sub-module deployed to maven alone, because sometime not all features should submit to master branch， we want new features  are  based on plugability, not be embbed in dubbo.
@chickenlj
please see this official project https://github.com/dubbo/dubbo-spring-boot-project

I found the way, Add <dubbo:parameter key="qos.port" value="22224"/> under the <dubbo: registry node


for example:

<dubbo:registry client="curator" protocol="${dubbo.registry.protocol}" address="${dubbo.registry.address}" username="${dubbo.registry.username}" password="${dubbo.registry.password}" register="true">
        <dubbo:parameter key="qos.port" value="22224"/>
    </dubbo:registry>
@web1992, I put some comments on your code change, pls. check.
下载一个dubbo-admin-2.4.1.war ,将这个war包放在tomcat中的webapps下面，启动即可，用户名/密码 root/root,访问地址：http://localhost:8080/dubbo-admin-2.4.1
should we really need to consider the compatibility to dubbox? is it possible to provide this ability with dubbo's extension mechanism, instead of invading into the core?

@beiwei30 The original dubbox has changed the core dubbo RPC protocol, so it's impossible now to achieve compatibility with dubbox with extension. 
For users using dubbox to transfer smoothly to dubbo, I think we can create a separate branch and a separate release, for example `2.5.x-dubbox-compatible`. This way, the compatible code would not merged into master branch, it will only exists as a transitional code.

I don't think consistenthash in dubbo meant for stateful, it will try to bring the traffics with same parameters to the same node. And consistent hash will reduce the fluctuation of requests when node changes.

The modular is on progress now, we plan to keep the core structure unchanged while introduce the following small changes:  
1. extract serialization module from `dubbo-common`.
2. change module name `dubbo-rpc-default` to `dubbo-rpc-dubbo`.

For dubbo users, they should mainly care about the following modules:  
* dubbo-rpc-dubbo - P2P Remoting RPC
* dubbo-remoting-netty - Network  Communication
* dubbo-registry-zookeeper - Service Registry&Discovery, LoadBalance
* dubbo-serialization-hessian2 - Serialization
* dubbo-config-spring/api - Configuration
@chickenlj How to deal with the module of api ?

For example, you can add the following dependencies to enable P2P RPC:
* dubbo-rpc-dubbo
* dubbo-remoting-netty
* dubbo-serialization-hessian2
* dubbo-config-spring

And if you also add `dubbo-registry-zookeeper`, you will have a registry integration and consumers will find service providers automatically and do load-balance between providers; Otherwise, you can also use Service Registry abilities provided by other infrastructures, such as K8S.

@zonghaishang 
API will still be packaged separately, as a plugin developer, you can depend on an single API.
My explanation above is mainly from the perspective of end users, for example:
`dubbo-registry-zookeeper` will pass `dubbo-registry-api`, `zookeeper`, and other modules as transitive dependencies, so users don't need to care about these.

1、dubbo分支或者版本是多少

I donot understand why you broadcast http session to dubbo service。
in my opinion，generally dubbo service is a biz layer and independent with session。you can create a session filter attached to dubbo just like dubbox。then any parameter in session will recovered and passed to certainly service。

Would you please create a PR?
And i will also have a check on this issue recently.

I also do not fully understand your requirement. I think you just want to pass the `sessionid` downstream when making a dubbo remote call, and `sessionid` will only be used on biz layer. Dubbo attachments is designed for that purpose.

And i have noticed that you use `http` protocol, Exchanger is only a abstract for `dubbo` protocol and it won't works for protocols like `http` or `hessian`.

具体由https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/blob/master/dubbo-common/src/main/java/com/alibaba/dubbo/common/extension/ExtensionLoader.java#L832
hasInvocation 控制
谁能解释一下这个变量的作用什么

@Jaskey You should check the detailed stack of the Waiting thread, why is it waiting? who called the Object.wait() sort of code?

> What about queues? I set the thread num as 200 and use fixed thread pool. Does it have queue before we schedule it in thread?

Dubbo has no queue for requests before schedule.

@kimmking @chickenlj 
1、项目需要共享session，在不改变现有业务代码基础上，穿插调用了session里保存的信息。
2、项目已经是通过Spring Session+Redis共享了session，现在只需要通过Cookie、URL传参把sessionId传递到各地业务实现层。
3、Spring Session是通过拦截Cookie、URL特定参数获取sessionId，再去Redis里寻找 相对应的session信息。

如此，Dubbo发送的URL里只要添加特定参数，那么，Spring Session首先拦截获取到sessionId就可以共享session了，不必变更业务代码了。否则，重构量很大。

我在寻找能在Dubbo consume端向provide端发送URL时，加入特定参数，以达到发送sessionId给provide端，让Spring Session自动拦截、获取、装载session。

即：如何给Dubbo URL里添加特定参数？？？
